byline.contributor: Raphael Minder contributed reporting from Madrid.

abstract: Basque separatist group ETA, in what may be acknowledgment that it has been badly weakened from crackdown by Spanish and French security forces, declares unilateral end to its campaign of violence after more than 40 years of struggle for independence.
snippet: After nearly half a century of violence, the separatist group ETA declared a unilateral end to its campaign of bombings and shootings in Europe.
lead_paragraph: After nearly half a century of violence, the separatist group ETA declared a unilateral end to its campaign of bombings and shootings in Europe.

headline.main: Basque Separatists Halt Campaign of Violence
headline.print_headline: Separatists Halt Violence To Advance Basque Goals
headline.seo: Basque Separatist Group ETA Declares Halt to Violence
